BETA_TOOLTIP: This is a BETA product configured for testing purposes. Some features can not work properly.
PROYECTO_TOCORORO: Tocororo Project, an effort for scientific communication in Cuba
SCEIBA_PRIVACIDAD_1: Sceiba is open source and open access and distributes its contents,

TOCO_SEARCH_QUERY_INPUT.INPUT_SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Write a phrase and press Enter

PAGINA_NO_ENCONTRADA_DISCULPA: Sorry, the page you requested could not be found!
GUARDAR_Y_HACER_UNA_NUEVA: Save and make a new one
EVAL_REV_GUARDADA: The journal evaluation was saved correctly!
C_001_Q_002: It is in Scopus and/or JCR of the Web of Science
C_001_Q_003: It is included in an indexing database and specialized summary
C_001_Q_004: It is included in an indexing database and multidisciplinary summary
C_002_Q_001: There is a website of the journal itself
C_002_Q_002: Availability of the latest published numbers
C_002_Q_003: Availability of articles published by the journal on its website
C_002_Q_004: There are journal articles in national and/or institutional open access repositories
C_002_Q_005: There are journal articles in general and/or thematic international open access repositories (e.g.: Zenodo, La Referencia, OceanDocs, Arxich, among others)
NO_DISPONIBLE_ULTIMO_NUM: The latest issue of the journal is not available
SOLAMENTE_DISPONIBLE_ULTIMO_NUM: Only the latest issue of the journal can be found
TODOS_NUM_PUBLICADOS_ULTIMOS_DOS_AÑOS: You will find all the numbers published by the journal in the last two years
C_003_Q_001: Use some metadata format (e.g.: Use of OAI-DC, DC, Cerif, Mods, METS, etc.)
C_003_Q_002: Use of OAI-PMH (the set 'openaire' or 'ec_fundedresources' or 'driver' may or may not exist)
C_003_Q_003: The metadata defined as mandatory in the OpenAIRE Guidelines for Literature Repositories v3 are present in all articles
C_003_Q_004: The metadata Field Language, Field License Condition, and Field Source, defined as recommended in the OpenAIRE Guidelines for Literature Repositories v3, are present in all articles
C_003_Q_005: It includes among its metadata the Persistent Identifier - ISSN and/or ISSN-E
C_003_Q_006: It includes among its metadata Persistent Identifier(s) of some digital object identifier (e.g.: DOI-Handle-URI-Scopus ID-Wos ID-Scielo ID)
C_003_Q_007: It includes among its metadata Persistent Identifier(s) for people (e.g.: ORCID)
C_003_Q_008: It includes among its metadata Persistent Identifier(s) for organizations (e.g.: GRID, ROR)
SITIO_OFICIAL_REV_VALIDADOR_OPENAIRE_FIE: Journal official website/OpenAIRE validator: check in Resource Identifier and Alternative Identifiers fields
C_004_Q_001: Allows articles to be deposited on non-commercial (open access repositories) or commercial (e.g.: Researchgate) platforms
C_004_Q_002: Declares that there is no cost for article processing (APC)
C_004_Q_003: It is an open access journal and declares an open access policy
C_004_Q_004: Promotes the deposit of research data in open access repositories as part of its editorial policy
C_004_Q_005: Offers its contents under some type of Creative Common license
VARIAS_VERSIONES_ART: Multiple versions of articles (including the editor's final version)
SOLAMENTE_VER_POST_PRINT: Only the post-print version (editor's final version)
NO_PERMITE_AUTOARCHIVADO_VER: Does not allow self-archiving of any version
C_005_Q_001: Declares that you accept articles in language
C_005_Q_002: The percentage of original articles in English published annually exceeds %15
C_005_Q_003: Members of the editorial committee who belong to foreign institutions
C_005_Q_004: The members of the editorial committee who are external to the publishing institution represent
C_005_Q_005: In the last two years, articles signed by members of the editorial board or by members of the publishing institution constitute
C_005_Q_006: The signature of authors affiliated with foreign institutions appears in
MAS_DEL_50_TOTAL_PUBLICADO_PERIODO: More than 50% of the total published in the period
ENTRE_EL_20_Y_50_TOTAL_PUBLICADO_PERIODO: Between 20% and 50% of the total published in the period
MENOS_DEL_20_TOTAL_PUBLICADO_PERIODO: Less than 20% of the total published in the period
MAS_DEL_25_TOTAL_ART_ULT_DOS_AÑOS: More than 25% of the total articles in the last two years
ENTRE_EL_5_Y_25_TOTAL_ART_ULT_DOS_AÑOS: Between 5% and 25% of the total articles in the last two years
MENOS_DEL_5_TOTAL_ART_ULT_DOS_AÑOS: Less than 5% of the total articles in the last two years
PRESENCIA_REDES_SOCIALES_GEN_ACAD: Dissemination and presence in general and academic social networks
C_006_Q_001: It has functionality to share content on social networks
C_006_Q_003: Spread your articles through social networks
REDES_SOCIALES: Twitter, Facebook, Mendeley and/or Researchgate (Plum or Dimensions in case of DOI)
PERFIL_RED_SOC_NO_MENDELEY_RESEARCHGATE: Has a profile on at least one social network (Twitter-Facebook-Instagram) but not on Mendeley and/or Researchgate
PERFIL_RED_SOC_SI_MENDELEY_RESEARCHGATE: Has a profile on at least one social network (Twitter-Facebook-Instagram) on Mendeley and/or Researchgate
GENERALES_TWITTER_FACEBOOK_INSTAGRAM: General such as Twitter-Facebook-Instagram (at least one of them)
TWITTER_FACEBOOK_INSTAGRAM_MENDELEY_RESE: Both on Twitter-Facebook-Instagram (at least one of them) and on Mendeley and/or Researchgate
C_007_Q_001: You have citations registered in Scimago/Scopus or Scielo Analytics or Google Scholar
C_007_Q_003: According to Google Scholar, the journal's H5 index
C_007_Q_002_HINT: This element will be considered for one of the following options: Scimago/Scopus, JCR, Scielo Analytics or Google Scholar. If you want to estimate more than one option, you have to do it differently. Citation totals from different sources should never be added together
MENOR_IGUAL_IND_H5_REV_PER_ANT: It is less than or equal to the H5 index of the journal in the previous period
MAYOR_IND_H5_REV_PER_ANT: It is higher than the H5 index of the journal in the previous period
Q3_Q4_JOURNAL_CITATION: In Q3-Q4 of Journal Citation Report/Scimago
Q1_Q2_JOURNAL_CITATION: In Q1-Q2 of Journal Citation Report/Scimago
SOLAMENTE_RANKINGS_REV_REG_TEMAT: Only included in rankings of regional/thematic journals such as Redalyc-Redib-CIRS-etc.
